枝垂れる: (しだれる) - to droop; to hang down; to weep

枝垂れ桃: (シダレモモ) - weeping peach (Prunus persica var. pendula)

枝折戸: (しおりど) - garden gate made of branches and twigs; wicket gate
枝振り: (えだぶり) - shape of a tree
枝神: (えだがみ) - enshrined deity of a subordinate shrine
枝肉: (えだにく) - dressed carcass; meat on the bone
枝葉: (shiyou) - ramos e folhas, folhagem; detalhes sem importância, não essenciais, questão secundária, digressão
枝葉末節: (しようまっせつ) - (yoji) unimportant details; inessentials

枠を付ける: (わくをつける) - to set a frame; to frame
枠内: (わくない) - within the limits (framework, boundaries, price, etc.)
枠型アンテナ: (わくがたアンテナ) - frame antenna
枠形アンテナ: (わくがたアンテナ) - frame antenna
枠物語: (わくものがたり) - frame story; frame narrative; frame tale
枠番連勝: (わくばんれんしょう) - bracket win (in horse-racing); bracket quinella
枠線: (わくせん) - grid-line (e.g. in spreadsheet); closing line
枠連: (わくれん) - bracket win (in horse-racing); bracket quinella
枡売り: (ますうり) - selling something by the boxful (in a wooden masu box)
枡席: (ますせき) - tatami "box seat" for four people at sumo, kabuki, etc.
枡形: (ますがた) - (ますがた only) square (shape); (斗形 only) square bearing block (at the top of a pillar); (ますがた only) (in a castle) rectangular space between the inner and outer gates (where troops can gather)
枡目: (ますめ) - measure; square (e.g. of graph paper or Japanese manuscript paper); box (e.g. on a form)
枡組: (ますぐみ) - square framing (in a house, temple, screen, etc.)
枡組み: (ますぐみ) - square framing (in a house, temple, screen, etc.)
枡酒: (ますざけ) - alcohol (esp. sake) served in a small wooden box; alcohol (esp. sake) sold in a small wooden box
枢密院: (すうみついん) - (Japanese) Privy Council (abolished in 1947)
枢戸: (くるるど) - door (with a pivot hinge)
枢木: (くるるぎ) - sliding wooden bolt (for holding a door or window shut)
枢機: (すうき) - important point/essential part/vital point; important state matters
枢軸国: (すうじくこく) - (World War II) Axis powers
枯らす: (からす) - to let dry; to kill (vegetation); to season (lumber)
枯らびる: (からびる) - to dry up; to shrivel
枯ればむ: (かればむ) - to begin to wither; to begin to dry out
枯れる: (かれる) - to wither (of a plant)/to be blasted/to die; to mature (of one's personality, abilities, etc.)
枯れ専: (カレセン) - (from 枯れたおじいさん専門) younger woman (usu. 20-30 years old) who is physically attracted to mature older men (usu. 50-60 years old)
枯れ山水: (かれさんすい) - traditional (Chinese or Japanese) dry landscape garden

枯れ果てる: (かれはてる) - to wither completely (of a plant); to dry up completely; to drop all its leaves
枯れ枝: (kareeda) - dead branch (ou galho, etc.), withered branch
枯れ草: (かれくさ) - dry grass; dead grass; hay; withered grass
枯れ葉マーク: (かれはマーク) - sticker for car drivers 70 years or older
枯山水: (こせんすい) - karesansui, traditional (Chinese or Japanese) dry landscape garden
枯木寒巌: (こぼくかんがん) - withered trees and frozen rocks; a person that is hard to approach
枯木死灰: (こぼくしかい) - withered trees and cold ash; someone who is detached and free of desires; someone who has no vitality
枯枝: (かれえだ) - dead branch (or twig, etc.); withered branch
